name: Hermes Growth Partners
overview:
Hermes Growth Partners (HGP) is a private equity advisory firm that focuses on growth-stage companies in the Telecom, Media and Technology (TMT) sectors globally.

The firmâ€™s primary objective is to help high-potential companies drive growth to create value. The firm is the exclusive advisor to the Canepa Global TMT Fund, seeking to invest $10m-$50m into TMT companies with enterprise value of $50-250m. HGP and the Canepa Global TMT Fund bring a combination of long term capital, extensive operational management skills and financial asset management experience to each situation. As such HGP views itself more as a strategic partner than a purely financial investor. HGP is flexible with respect to control vs. minority stakes but will only consider situations where there is an opportunity to drive growth through its active involvement.
